name: PermanentlyDeleteFolderInTrash
description:
Permanently delete a folder from the trash.

This tool permanently deletes a folder that is in the trash, and this action cannot be undone. It should be called when there is a need to remove a folder from the trash permanently.

parameters.name: folder_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier representing a folder to be permanently deleted from the trash. Obtainable from folder URL or use '0' for root folder.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a folder.

The ID for any folder can be determined
by visiting this folder in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/folder/123`
the `folder_id` is `123`.

The root folder of a Box account is
always represented by the ID `0`.
